synonyms.synonym: Promyelocytic leukemia nuclear body-associated protein ISG20

protein.specific_function: Exonuclease with specificity for single-stranded RNA and, to a lesser extent for DNA. Degrades RNA at a rate that is approximately 35-fold higher than its rate for single-stranded DNA. Involved in the antiviral function of IFN against RNA viruses

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on ester bonds

reference.reference_text: Gongora C, David G, Pintard L, Tissot C, Hua TD, Dejean A, Mechti N: Molecular cloning of a new interferon-induced PML nuclear body-associated protein. J Biol Chem. 1997 Aug 1;272(31):19457-63.
